dialogue.sjis: ウデを上げたようだな 今度はお前に修理を頼むとするか
dialogue.ascii: So your crafting skills improved! I'll have to trouble you with repair commissions next time.

dialogue.sjis: 最近、めっきり平和だね 何が危ないって そんなに強そうに見えない女の子でも
dialogue.ascii: It's peaceful lately, isn't it? Though you gotta watch out for gals who are tougher than they look!

dialogue.sjis: すごく強かったりするから 気をつけろよ
dialogue.ascii: I mean it, those kinda girls are the most dangerous types! Be careful out there.
